retail-landing.banner_title: Reimagine how you sell with Sales Apps
retail-landing.banner_desc: We help market leaders transform their business.
retail-landing.feature_desc1: Transform your smartphone or tablet into an easy to use point-of-sale. Connect a receipt printer, barcode scanner, and cash drawer.
retail-landing.feature_desc2: Turn once-in-a-while shoppers into regulars. Run loyalty program to reward customers for their recurring purchases
retail-landing.feature_desc3: Imagine resolving every customer service inquiry promptly and proficiently—without a single sloppy handoff or having to scramble for purchase histories.
retail-landing.management_desc: With a customer support platform focused on the features that matter most to service agents, you’ll always have instant access to the exact insights you need.
retail-landing.management_item1_desc: Reach customers across every channel: telephone, email, live chat, and social media.
retail-landing.management_item2_desc: Integrated payments save time, ensure better accuracy and minimize errors.
retail-landing.management_item3_desc: From a single source of truth, you can exceed customer expectations and build bigger shop.
retail-landing.management_item4_desc: You can set your preferences to be alerted only for specific kinds of activities.
retail-landing.management_item5_desc: Create an online catalog of your products, and allow your customers to make purchases directly.
retail-landing.management_item6_desc: We offer real-time shipment monitoring for all of your express pickups and deliveries.
retail-landing.business_desc: Small businesses can now manage their customer relationships more easily than ever
retail-landing.news_desc: Read more about latest news and our special event

saas-landing.banner_subtitle: Millions of happy users work better with our integrated Apps.
saas-landing.feature_desc1: Our audience dashboard shows you pre-built segments like top locations, recent sources of growth, and even customer lifetime value (CLV).
saas-landing.feature_desc2: With strong technical foundations, has allowed us to leverage business experts to build hundreds of improvements.
saas-landing.feature_desc3: We empowers your marketing, sales and services teams to collaborate across the entire customer lifecycle for more meaningful, memorable experiences.
saas-landing.pricing_subtitle: The best value designed for your workplace, starting at just $24/user/month.
saas-landing.faq_subtitle: Have a question? Check out our frequently asked questions to find your answer.

social-landing.banner_title: Bringing you closer to the people.
social-landing.banner_desc: We're committed to fostering a safe and supportive community for everyone.
social-landing.feature_desc1: You'll get fast, simple, secure messaging, available on phones all over the world.
social-landing.feature_desc2: Our features help you express yourself and connect with the people you love.
social-landing.feature_desc3: Tips, success stories and new features help you build your brand and tell your story.
social-landing.discover_item1_desc: Follow us for the latest news, featured profiles, and tips for creators.
social-landing.discover_item2_desc: Build influence and create compelling content that's distinctly yours.
social-landing.discover_item3_desc: Share and grow your brand with our diverse, global community.
social-landing.discover_item4_desc: Express yourself in new ways with the latest Social Apps features.
social-landing.discover_item5_desc: Keep in touch with the groups of people that matter the most.
social-landing.discover_item6_desc: With voice calls, you can talk to your friends and family for free.
social-landing.faq_subtitle: Have a question? Check out our frequently asked questions to find your answer.
social-landing.news_desc: Read more about latest news and our special event
